Description:
You shake the ground with an earth-shattering quake. All creature in range must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking half damage on a success and full damage on a fail. Creatures in range that are burrowed or in the invulnerable stage of Dig take double damage from this move. Raised creatures are immune to the effects and damage of this move. Roll a d100 on the table below to determine damage and use the matching multiplier for the user level. The damage calculation is: (dice from the d100 table x multiplier by level) + MOVE modifier

| d100       | Dice     |
| 01-05     | 1d4       |
| 06-15     | 1d8       |
| 16-35     | 1d10    |
| 36-65     | 1d12    |
| 66-85     | 2d6       |
| 86-95     | 2d8       |
|  96-100 | 2d12    |

Multiplier by level:
From level 1 to 4: 1x
From level 5 to 9: 2x
From level 10 to 16: 3x
From level 17 to 20: 4x
Scaling: Higher Levels: For damage rolls, use 2x Dice at level 5, 3x Dice at level 10, and 4x Dice at level 17.
